name: Untitled Multiplayer Platformer
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game is currently a work in progress. Since it is not a final version some parts of the game may not be fully functional and bugs or crashes can occur.

A MINIMUM OF 2 PLAYERS IS REQUIRED

Controls scheme: WASD / SPACEBAR
While in game you can press escape at any time to quit the game.

Question Form: https://forms.gle/gh2m5Mc52wguwFX36
